YASHODEEP Academy is structured on the principle of consistency and hard work and believes in scientific approach based on perfect planning and proper guidance. Student’s overall development and splendid success is our prime concern. The limited strength of students in each class, its unique working schedule, pre-planning of complete syllabus, and its strict implementation, personal attention to every student, perfect working pattern, sincere and devout teachers, regular Unit-Tests, Board Pattern-wise preparation of every question paper, etc. has produced altogether a number of merit holders in 10th and 12th Maharashtra State Board exams and in other competitive exam at Yashodeep Academy. We are achieving great success in the year 2015-2016 and 2016-2017.Many of our students are perusing their degree in reputed institute like MIT, D.Y .Patil etc. In upcoming year we are trying our best, we give our sincere effort to students so that they can get admission in IIT, NIT and MBBS College in India.

Our mission is to provide quality education to the students of YD Academy and to help them to excel in their studies. The motto of our classes “Education for Excellence” inspires us to achieve, create conducive atmosphere for the students to learn their lessons well. In addition, through our classroom teaching services, students develop a deeper love of learning and gain more self-confidence.//

Our Vision is to instill confidence in students and assist them in becoming independent learner who they rely on their strength and abilities .Provide career planning ,guidance and development resource to make their dream come true through high quality teaching ,technology enables system and commitment.

Director Yogesh Sir( Mtech (Etx) (Maths)) "
" In this sacred city Alandi, we have started YASHODEEP ACADEMY in 2014 with the blessings of Saint Dnyaneshwar Mauli In this competitive world, we are trying to make students capable to face mental, physical as well as academic challenges. As parents shows reliability in our academy, we are trying to be worthy of it. We have nourished more than thousands of students Name that has become synonymous with expanding the frontiers of quality education and taking it to untouched horizons of excellence. Prof.Yogesh Darekar The Director of YASHODEEP Academy from Alandi. He completed his degree(BE) in Electronics from MIT. His passion for teaching led him to found YD Academy.Prof.Yogesh Darekar has 7 years of teaching experience and has worked with more than 1000 students. Prof.VIKAS .N. SHINDE(Physics) As a part of YASHODEEP family,I have been working since the beginning. As we know 10th and 12th are the turning point of students career ,we are very fortunate to have them at this crucial point. Our aim is not just teaching because we think that Teacher makes the difference, not the classroom. We conduct more activities than teaching to comprehend more knowledge in them. We regularly practice MEDITATION in our academy and it has shown tremendous improvement in their academic performance. "
" Vikas N.Shinde.(BE EnTC) "
" Trupti Sagar Virkar Ex-Assistant Professor at RJSPM Dudulgaon With the zeal to gain and spread knowledge she joined RSPM College of Pharmacy in 2012 as an Assistant Professor. With 100% results in all the three batches guided by her, she also got a chance to become academic In-charge of Pharmacy Department in 2015. She has started her teaching career after achieving Bachelor degree in Pharmacy with Distinction. Since then her Passionate and determined approach towards teaching have not only helped Students to achieve success in their exams but also to achieve great heights in there carriers. Use of Latest Technology and Social Networking apps for making students get a deep drive in the topics helps them to understand content thoroughly. She had actively participated in various National and International Conferences which had helped her to sharpen her Teaching Skills

string-array.name: courses1
string-array.item: Diploma in Beauty culture and Hair dressing

string-array.name: courses2
string-array.item: B.Sc. in Hospitality and Hotel Administration
Bachelor of Ayurveda, Medicine and Surgery (B.A.M.S.)
Bachelor of Dental Surgery (B. D. S.)
Bachelor of Homeopathic Medicine and Surgery (B.H.M.S.)
Bachelor of Veterinary Science and Animal Husbandry (B.V.Sc.and AH)
Bachelor of Science in Dairy Technology (B.Sc.Dairy Technology)

resources.string: It is typically a 2-year program to train candidates in the fundamental principles of visual and design experience
Arts Teacher
Commercial art, often called advertising art, helps understand nuance of selling goods and services. It is completely different from fine art.
Art studios, Advertising companies, Publishing houses, Fashion houses
Beauty Care courses, ranging from 3 months to a year, impart training in body care. Job profile generally begins with trainee in beauty salons.
Self Beauty saloon and Beauty Expert
Garment Technology is a 3-year diploma course which equips candidates with techniques of timely delivery of merchandise and optimal resource utilization.
Self Boutique and Fashion designer
It is a one-year diploma in administrative vocational trade where candidates are equipped in taking short-hand dictations and perform clerical duties.
Secretary, Stenographer, Computer Operator, Clerk-cum-Typist in Private and Govt. sector
It is a technical degree below the undergraduate rank which aims to enable students to understand technical communication and apply basic problem solving techniques.
Govt. Contractor
Industrial Training Institutes (ITIs) are government-run training organizations which offer post-school technical training ranging from 6 months to 2 years in varied fields.
Apprentice, welder and Govt. jobs

This course is meant for training in Clinical Laboratory technology where students are equipped with technical know-how for placement in clinical labs and hospitals. Though duration varies, it is mostly a 3-year course.
Lab Technician, Lab Assistant, Self employmentr
Lateral entry BFA, MFA

It is a 3-year degree programme affiliated by National Council for Hotel Management and Catering Technology (NCHMCT). Admission is conducted through an All India Joint Entrance Exam- NCHMJEE.
Management Trainee in Hotel and hospitality. > Kitchen Management/Housekeeping positions in Hotels. > Flight Kitchens and on-board flight services > Indian Navy Hospitality services

Diploma courses in varied dance forms and music genres as well as instruments can be pursued by candidate for hobby or as a professional programme.Admission to the program is same as that for 3-year BSc. ie. through All India Joint Entrance Examination-JEE, in which the first three semesters are common to both the streams ie. Generic and Specialisation. In the forth semester, students who opt for specialisation are allotted their choice based on merit and marks scored by them in the semesters one and two.
Choreographers, Dance Teacher, Performing Artist
It is a one-year diploma in administrative vocational trade where candidates are equipped in taking short-hand dictations and perform clerical duties.
Elementary school teacher and Nursery school teacher
One year diploma course offering management training in entry level jobs in hotels, airports, travel companies/agencies, cruise liners and online travel booking websites.
Job opportunities in hotels, Quick Service Restaurant (QSR)

This is a 5-year integrated law course where candidates can choose a Law programme aligned with their core stream - B.A. LL.B (Hons.) , B.B.A. LL.B (Hons.) , B.Sc. LL.B (Hons.) , B.Com. LL.B (Hons.) and , B.S.W. LL.B (Hons.)
Legal Advisor, Legal Practitioner and Advocate
L.L.M , M. Phil. , Ph.D , Post Graduate Law Diploma, Post Graduate Law Diploma, Master of Public Policy, Post Graduate Diploma in Labour Law (D.L.L.)
It is a five-and-a-half-year undergraduate degree course that also includes one year of internship. After successful completion of the course, students are designated as Ayurvedacharya doctor.
Ayurveda Consultation, General Practice, Clinical Research
Master of Public Health, PG Diploma
It is 5-year degree course, which includes 4 years of study followed by one year of internship. After successful completion of this degree programme, candidate is designated as Dentist.
Lecturer, General Practice
Master of Dental Surgery, Master of Public Health

BHMS is an undergraduate degree course of five-and-a-half-year duration (including one year compulsory internship). After successful completion of the course, students are designated as Homeopathic doctor.
Homeopathy Consultation, General Practice, Clinical Research
Doctor of Medicine in Homeopathy, PG Diploma

MBBS is a five-and-a-half-year degree course which includes one year of mandatory internship in a hospital attached or approved by the concerned medical college. After successful completion of the course, students can practice Medicine and Surgery.
Doctor, General Clinical Practice, Research
Doctor of Medicine(MD), Master of surgery (MS)
Bachelor of Science is three-year degree programme offered in multitude of specializations under the pure sciences domain such as Maths, Physics, Chemistry, Botany, Zoology etc.
BPO, SSC Exams, Graduate level exams
MSc,MA
Bachelor of Science in Nursing is a four-year programme which involves classroom lessons, practical sessions as well as clinical work apart from internship.
Employment in Hospitals and Clinics, Training institutes
MSc Nursing, Post Graduate Program in Public Health Management (PGPPHM)
This is a five year undergraduate degree course with 6 months mandatory internship which includes training in practicing and teaching Veterinary science and livestock and poultry farm management.
Veterinary Clinics, Zoos and Wild life Research organizations
Master of Veterinary Science, PhD (Veterinary and Animal Sciences)

The Bachelor of Architecture (B.Arch.), recognized by Council of Architecture (COA), is 5-year degree programme including a period of practical training prior to professional examination and registration.
Design Architect, Project Architect, Interior Architect
Master in Architecture (M Arch), MBA
Bachelor of Computer Applications is an undergraduate degree course of three years which equips candidate with skills to analyze and synthesize computer systems, applications and information systems.
Programmer, Networking Professional
MCA, MCM, B. Ed.
BE/B Tech is a four-year engineering degree programme approved by AICTE in specific branchs such as Civil, Mechanical, Electrical, Information Technology etc.
IT Professional, Government Contractors
ME/M Tech, MS, MBA
Bachelor of planning is a professional four-year technical degree programme which prepares candidates with adequate skills for infrastructure planning in different capacities.
Professional Planner, Architectural Firms
Master of Planning
Candidates interested in careers as Cinematographer can pursue diploma course which enables them to operate technical devices and understand props towards getting perfect shots.
It is a 4-year undergraduate agriculture science and technology course which deals with processing milk and other allied products.
Quality Control Analyst in dairy processing plants
Master of Science in Dairy Technology
Bachelor of Technology in Agriculture Engineering is a 4-year programme which deals with the study of breeding plants which are consumed by human beings and livestock
Teaching, Farm Manager, Researcher
Master of Technology in Agriculture
